member.name: T:Articy.Api.ApiConsts
member.summary: static class that contains some constants and a error code helper method

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.ApiFacility
member.summary: the facility number from API reported errors

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.ErrorCodeMask
member.summary: the bit mask that can be applied to the ErrorCode of an to extract the error number

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.FacilityMask
member.summary: the bitmask used to extract the facility number from the ErrorCode of an . This mask must be applied after shifting down the bits.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.FacilityShift
member.summary: the number of bits the facility bits are shifted up (left)

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.MakeErrorCode(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: helper method to combine a facility number and an error number to an error code
member.param: the facility that has reported the error
the facility private error number
member.returns: an error code with the combined bits from facility and error number

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.MsgSrcApi
member.summary: the message source used to report API related messages

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.MsgSrcSystem
member.summary: the message source used to report "system" messages from the underlying articy:draft client

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiConsts.ServerFacility
member.summary: the facility number for articy:server reported errors

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ApiMode
member.summary: Enum that specifies in which context the API is used

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiMode.Unknown
member.summary: unknown context, should never reach an be seen by API code, only internally when the welcome screen or the Server-Administration-Mode is active

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiMode.Program
member.summary: The API code runs as a stand-alone API program

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiMode.MultiUserPlugin
member.summary: The code runs as plugin in a multi-user project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ApiMode.SingleUserPlugin
member.summary: The code runs as plugin in a single-user project

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException
member.summary: The standard exception used when the API has found an expected error

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(Articy.Api.ErrorCode)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: an error code from the API error code enumeration

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(Articy.Api.ErrorCode,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: an error code from the API error code enumeration
an catched innter exception

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(Articy.Api.ErrorCode,System.String)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: an error code from the API error code enumeration
The message to pass to the exception

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(Articy.Api.ErrorCode,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: an error code from the API error code enumeration
The message to pass to the exception
an catched innter exception

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: the 32 bit error code with facility and error number

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: the 32 bit error code with facility and error number
an catched innter exception

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: the 32 bit error code with facility and error number
The message to pass to the exception

member.name: M:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Create an API exception with a specific error code
member.param: the 32 bit error code with facility and error number
The message to pass to the exception
an catched innter exception

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The error code this exception encapsulates, upper 16 bit are facility code, lower 16 bits are the error number within that facility

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.ErrorNumber
member.summary: Getter that extracts the error number from the ErrorCode

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.FacilityCode
member.summary: Getter that extracts the facility from the ErrorCode

member.name: P:Articy.Api.ArticyApiException.Message
member.summary: The formatted message of this exception

member.name: T:Articy.Api.CloseProgressMode
member.summary: Enumeration that describes what to do with a progress window if its operation has finished

member.name: F:Articy.Api.CloseProgressMode.Never
member.summary: The progress window is never closed automatically

member.name: F:Articy.Api.CloseProgressMode.NoError
member.summary: The progress windows is closed if there are no error or warnings present

member.name: F:Articy.Api.CloseProgressMode.Always
member.summary: The progress window is always closed when the process has finished

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext
member.summary: Is used as a context indicator when a MDK plugin requests a context menu.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext.Other
member.summary: Source is unspecified

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext.Global
member.summary: The context menu for the global ribbon entry was used (SelectedObjects is null)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext.Navigator
member.summary: The context menu was opened using a right click in the navigator tree

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext.ContentArea
member.summary: The context menu was opened using a right click on the content are (Flow, Location editor, ...)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext.Search
member.summary: The context menu was requested for a result set of a search from the navigator search tab

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ContextMenuContext.Conflicts
member.summary: The context menu was requested for a result set of a search from the navigator conflict search tab

member.name: T:Articy.Api.EntryType
member.summary: Entry type of log messages

member.name: F:Articy.Api.EntryType.Error
member.summary: the message denotes an error

member.name: F:Articy.Api.EntryType.Warning
member.summary: the message denotes a warning

member.name: F:Articy.Api.EntryType.Info
member.summary: the message denotes a information

member.name: F:Articy.Api.EntryType.Trace
member.summary: the message is a trace entry

member.name: F:Articy.Api.EntryType.Debug
member.summary: the message is a debug output

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ErrorCode
member.summary: This enumeration contains error codes that are detected by the API

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NotInitialized
member.summary: the API was not initialized before trying to create a session

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.AlreadyInitialized
member.summary: tried to initialize more than one time

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DotNetFrameworkNotFound
member.summary: the required .NET framework was not found

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.Internal
member.summary: thrown when an internal error occured in the a:d logic

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.GenericException
member.summary: an unexpected exception from a lower level system was catched and wrapped

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectNotFound
member.summary: the project given to load is unknown (either missing rights, deleted or never existing)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.SourceControlError
member.summary: an exception was catched that originates from source control (-> see inner exception)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnknownServerError
member.summary: an articy:server exception was catched but there is no RpcStatusCode available for a more detailed error

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnknownExport
member.summary: the exports technical name is not known

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidExportDescriptior
member.summary: failed to parse the export descriptor or missing export type in root element

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NotConnected
member.summary: an command was issued that requires to be logged on

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ColumnNotFound
member.summary: a column was not found on a given object

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.WriteDenied
member.summary: writing to a row was denied because the row is read-only

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ObjectNotAvailable
member.summary: an object that was encapsulated by an proxy does not exist any more

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidState
member.summary: a call is impossible in the current object/project state

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnknownPartition
member.summary: the given partition guid is unknown

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.PartitionNotClaimed
member.summary: tried to unclaim a partition that the API user does not own

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantForcefullyUnclaimOwnPartition
member.summary: tried to forcefully unclaim an own partition

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectNotOpen
member.summary: is thrown when a method expects an open project but there is no open project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectOpen
member.summary: is thrown when a method expects that no open project exist but there is a open project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantSetCalculatedProperty
member.summary: tried to write a calculated property

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.PropertyNotFound
member.summary: the given property does not exist for the given object

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnexpectedObjectClass
member.summary: the given class was not expected to be API exposed

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ObjectNotCustomizeable
member.summary: tried to set a feature value on a non customizable object

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoTemplateSet
member.summary: tried to set a feature value on a object without a set template

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.FeatureNotPresent
member.summary: tried to set a feature value where the object does not contain that feature

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantSetStrip
member.summary: a strip can't be set directly

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnsetObjectStrip
member.summary: thrown when trying to access an unset object collection

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnknownDataType
member.summary: a value getter or setter encountered an unknown data type

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnknownDataSubType
member.summary: a value getter or setter encountered an unknown data sub type

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidValue
member.summary: the given value is not allowed for setting it to a property

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ObjectCreationForbidden
member.summary: it is forbidden to create an object of this type at this target

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantOpenProject
member.summary: thrown when a project can't be opened

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NeedExclusiveModeToOpen
member.summary: thrown when a project needs an exclusive mode to open but the flag was not set

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NotAllowedInExclusiveMode
member.summary: thrown when partition actions are used in exclusive mode

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnknownTemplate
member.summary: the referenced template does not exist (either name or ID)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.TemplateNotAllowedForObject
member.summary: the template exists but is not allowed for the object

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantSetReadOnlyProperty
member.summary: tried to set a property that is read-only

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantSetObjectAggregates
member.summary: thrown when properties of data subtype "Model" are tried to be written by the API

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ObjectIsNotConnectable
member.summary: thrown when a connectable object is needed (adding pins for example)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ForbiddenPinCount
member.summary: thrown when a the operation would result in a forbidden pin count

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.FatalErrorDetected
member.summary: thrown when a fatal error in the business logic was detected

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UnsupportedObject
member.summary: thrown when trying to access an object that is not allowed for API use

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.IndexOutOfRange
member.summary: list access with index out of range

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ParentDoesNotAllowFolders
member.summary: thrown by create folder if the parent does not allow it

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ObjectNull
member.summary: thrown then a non-null object proxy was expected but null was found

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidParentForCreate
member.summary: thrown when a object creation fails due to a wrong parents. E.g. Trying to import an Asset into an EntityUserFolder

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NeedMoreVertices
member.summary: thrown when creating a path or polygon with violated minimum vertex count

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.WrongReferencedObjectType
member.summary: thrown when wrong object type is assigned to an object reference (Link or Jump for example)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidTechnicalName
member.summary: thrown when an internal error occurred in the a:d logic

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DisplayNameMustNotBeEmpty
member.summary: thrown when a display name is null, empty or only contains whitespace chars

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ParseException
member.summary: thrown if parsing a query reported an error

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.AssetsNotReady
member.summary: asset system is not clean and not ready for unclaim

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.PartitionClaimed
member.summary: You tried to update a partition that you already have claimed

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidDataFound
member.summary: This error code denotes that a folder given as project folder contains a non matching project or no project at all

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.MissingProjectFolder
member.summary: This error code is thrown when an open project does not know where to place the project data. E.g. the project was never opened and no Project-Folder was given in the open args.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ExportFailed
member.summary: This error code is thrown when an export could not completed successfully. The reason may either be an unexpected exception from the lower layer or most likely an error condition that was also reported to the logging callback (if set)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.AssetObjectExpected
member.summary: This error code is thrown when an asset object is expected but was not given.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.AssetFileNotFound
member.summary: This error code is thrown when an asset

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DeleteNotAllowed
member.summary: This error code is thrown when a delete is not allowed. This can be the case if an inner object is a partition root object.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantDeletePartitionRoot
member.summary: This error is thrown when you try to delete an object that is the root of a partition

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantDeleteSystemFolder
member.summary: This error is thrown when you try to delete a system folder object (e.g. Assets)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.WrongContextForDocument
member.summary: operations on documents require a context object, that must be a document or a child of a document. If this is not the case this exception is thrown.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.WrongContextObjctTypeForDocument
member.summary: Only Documents & TextObjects are allowed to have children in a document.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidHierarchyAdjustment
member.summary: This error is thrown if the hierarchical placement of a new document element is not allowed. e.g. Trying to add an TextObject as sibling of an Document object.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DocumentObjectExpected
member.summary: This error is thrown when an document object was expected as parameter but another was given.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ComponentLicenseMissing
member.summary: This error is thrown when a functionality is used which needs a specific license, but this license is not present.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidQuery
member.summary: This error is thrown when a calculated reference strip is accessed, but executing the query fails for some reason.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidVariableName
member.summary: This error is thrown when the given full qualified variable name is malformed.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NameNotUnique
member.summary: This error is thrown when a variable or variable set name is already used.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ExpressionError
member.summary: This error is thrown when an expression contains an error.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NonScriptableProperty
member.summary: This error is thrown when trying to validate an expression on a property that does not support scripting.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ObjectNotPartitionable
member.summary: This error is thrown when trying to partition an object that cannot be a partition.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.RepartitioningFailed
member.summary: This error is thrown when a repartitioning action failed.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.WrongObjectType
member.summary: This object passed to a function is of the wrong or an unsupported object type

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ParentNotClaimed
member.summary: This error code is throw when using accessing the position/sizing members of an flow-item and the parent-container object is not claimed.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantAddPin
member.summary: This error code is throw when trying to add a pin to an object that either has no pins (e.g Entity), does not allow to add pins (e.g. Condition) or has reached the limit of allowed pins (currently 10)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantRemovePin
member.summary: This error code is throw when trying to remove a pin from an object that has no pins (e.g. Entity) or does not allow to remove pins ( e.g. Condition)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.StandaloneMultiUserExpected
member.summary: This error code is throw when trying execute session commands that are only available for stand-alone multi-user programs (e.g. OpenProject)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.MultiUserExpected
member.summary: This error code is throw when trying execute session commands that are only available for multi-user API programs (e.g. GetUsers)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ServerExceptionCatched
member.summary: An exception was catched, no detailed error reason available

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.MandatoryParameterMissing
member.summary: The call could not be process because mandatory parameters were missing

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NotANumber
member.summary: The parsing of a number failed

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.AccessDenied
member.summary: The requesting user did not have the required rights to access/modify the requested information

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidServerState
member.summary: The call could not be completed in the current server session state. (e.g. trying to login when a authenticated session already exists)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DataInconsistent
member.summary: Some consistency checks on the given parameter have failed

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DatabaseException
member.summary: An error from the database query layer has been catched

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoSession
member.summary: A method that expected an existing session was called, but the session is not available

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.RequestTimeout
member.summary: The processing of a method did not return in time

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.RemoteRequestTimeout
member.summary: The processing of an upsteam call (e.g. License-Server) did not return in time

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoActiveConnection
member.summary: There was not active connection at the time a call was issued.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ServerDbUnavailable
member.summary: This error code is thrown if you try to login to an server which did not have its database ready

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ServerFail
member.summary: generic error if the server reaches a code point where other checks already should have stopped the processing

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.RemoteServerException
member.summary: The processing of an upsteam call (e.g. License-Server) has thrown an exception.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UserNotFound
member.summary: the requested user was not found on the server or was deactivated

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InvalidPassword
member.summary: the password (hash) does not match

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.LoginNotAllowed
member.summary: The login was denied because the same user has an active session from a different machine

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantCreateUser
member.summary: The new user row can't be created because either the user already exists or no license is available

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantUpdateUser
member.summary: The user row can't be updated because the login name conflicts with an already existing user

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectNotFoundOnServer
member.summary: The requested project was not found (or deactivated)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantOpenExclusive
member.summary: The requested project can't be opened exclusive (already exclusively open elsewhere or locks are present)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectAlreadyOpen
member.summary: The server known that you have the project already open (it is not allowed to open the same project twice at the same time)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ClaimsPresent
member.summary: When you try to claim an partition and that partition is already claimed, this error is thrown

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectAlreadyOpenedExclusive
member.summary: The project can't be opened because it already is open exclusive by another user

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectDeactivated
member.summary: You tried to open a deactivated project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ProjectUnavailable
member.summary: You tried to open an project that is temporarily unavailable (e.g. a ForcefullyUnclaimPartitions command is pending)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.UsersWorking
member.summary: Tried to initiate a "forcefully unclaim all partitions" command while users are working in the project and you did not specify to kick those users

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NeedExclusiveModeToCleanup
member.summary: Project needs an exclusive mode to cleanup

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.RepartitioningActive
member.summary: Current operation can't be executed because the publishing/commiting of an repartitioning is pending. Try again later.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoClaimPresent
member.summary: You tried to forcedully unclaim a partition that is not currently claimed

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NeedsFullUpdate
member.summary: The project was repartitioned, before new claims can be taken, a full project update needs to be done.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoLicense
member.summary: You tried to log into a server that has no license. (SystemAdmin user can still log-in to fix this)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ServerLicenseExpired
member.summary: The articy:server main product license has expired

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ServerLicenseAlreadyActivated
member.summary: The articy:server was requested to activate a license, but is already licensed

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.LicenseKeyMismatch
member.summary: The license update for the server returned a license key that was not requested (should never happen)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoApiLicense
member.summary: A user tried to login using the articy:draft API but the server was not licensed for API usage

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoCAL
member.summary: A user logged in that did not have a client access license assigned (either multi-user or viewer)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.DowngradeRequired
member.summary: The server admin tries to change the license of a user to a more restrictive license (e.g. from "multi-user" to "viewer"), but the user is member of a project and has access that is not covered by the requested license. The downgrade is automatically done when the matching checkbox in the editing dialog is checked

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.InsufficientCAL
member.summary: This error is returned when you try to give a user higher access than it current license allows (e.g. TeamMember level for a user with viewer license)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoCALAvailable
member.summary: This error is returned when you try to upgrade a user to a new CAL, but all free licenses are already used

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.Underlicensed
member.summary: This error is returned when a user tries to log on an the CAL type the user owns has more licenses used than allowed. This error only can arise with CALs that have an expiry date.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantEnterPartitioningMode
member.summary: This error is returned when a user tries to enter the repartitioning mode, but another user already uses it.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.CantConnectArticyServer
member.summary: This error is thrown when the given server can't be connected

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ArticyServerToOld
member.summary: This error is thrown when the connected articy:server has a version that is to low to operate with

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.ArticyServerToNew
member.summary: This error is thrown when the connected articy:server has a version that is to new to operate with

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ErrorCode.NoArticyServerInfoAvailable
member.summary: This error is thrown when articy:draft was no possible to retrieve the server capability/version information

member.name: T:Articy.Api.HierarchyAdjustment
member.summary: Specifies the placement of a new document object in respect to the given context object.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.HierarchyAdjustment.AsUncle
member.summary: Creates the element as sibling of the parent of the given context object (Hierarchy level -1)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.HierarchyAdjustment.AsSibling
member.summary: Creates the new object directly after the given context element as sibling at the same hierarchy level (Hierarchy level +0) and placing it directly after all the children of the context element.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.HierarchyAdjustment.AsChild
member.summary: Creates the new object as the child of the context element. (Hierarchy level +1) This child is always the first child, any already existing child objects are moved down.

member.name: T:Articy.Api.JourneyActionTypes
member.summary: Available actions to take while recording a journey

member.name: F:Articy.Api.JourneyActionTypes.Skip
member.summary: Skips the children of this node and continues directly with its output pins.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.JourneyActionTypes.Next
member.summary: Follows the path along with the next element.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.JourneyActionTypes.Submerge
member.summary: Dives into the children of this node.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.JourneyActionTypes.Emerge
member.summary: Dives out of the children back to the parent node.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.JourneyActionTypes.Branch
member.summary: Identifies a branching option, multiple of these might be returned as an allowed action and each stands for one possible choice to advance the journey.

member.name: T:Articy.Api.LoggingCallback
member.summary: The delegate used to report logging information
member.param: the source of the message. Can either be one of the predefined sources 'System' or 'API' or a user given source name as found as LogSourceName in the parameter args objects required by some methods
the entry type of the message
the actual message text

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ObjectContext
member.summary: Specifies the context a given object resides. The context is calculated by checking if the given object is a child of the matching system folder

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames
member.summary:
This class contains constants for all properties that are introduced by the base objects of articy:draft.
You can find type infos and restrictions in braces after the name

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.AbsoluteFilePath
member.summary: the asset's qualified absolute file path including the currently used project folder. [string, read-only]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.AssetCategory
member.summary: The category of the asset. [Enum (int), read-only]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.AssetFilename
member.summary: The filename of the asset in the project dir. only contains the name [string, read-only] deprecated use "Filename" instead

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.AssetState
member.summary: The state of the asset (Ready, Importing, ...) When using one the ApiSession.ImportAsset overloads you will discover state changes on the returned object [enum (int), read-only, volatile]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.Attachments
member.summary:
The name of the property containing the object's attachments. This property can only be used with the object list management methods. The list returned from is only a read-only list containing current objects. [IList<ObjectProxy>]
Check to check whether an object has this property. (E.g. Pin or Connections do not have this property)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.AutoDisplayNamePosition
member.summary: Determines if the display name of an object should be positioned automatically. [boolean]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.BBCodeText
member.summary:
The Text/Description/Spoken text element of most objects as bb markup text [string]
Check to check whether an object has this property. (E.g. Pin or Connections do not have this property)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.BooleanValue
member.summary: A boolean evaluation of the default value. If the variable has integer type, 0 evaluates to false, any other to true

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.Color
member.summary:
The color of the object [System.Windows.Media.Color]
Check to check whether an object has this property. (E.g. Pin or Connections do not have this property)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.Content
member.summary: The content of a Note in the XML markup notation. The XML conforms the ScratchpadDocument.xsd. [string, read-only, XML markup]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.CreatedBy
member.summary: The name of the creator of the comment [string, read-only]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.CreatedOn
member.summary: The timestamp of the creation of the comment in UTC time. [DateTime, read-only]

member.summary: The data type of a variable. [Enum (int), e.g. Integer, Boolean]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.DefaultValue
member.summary: the string representation of the default value of a variable

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.Description
member.summary: The description of a variable. [string]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.DisplayName
member.summary:
The display name as it can be seen in the navigator [string, non empty]
Check to check whether an object has this property. (E.g. Connections do not have a DisplayName)

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.ObjectReference
member.summary: describes which object is referenced by this journey point. When "JourneyPointType" is one of "InputPinSelection", "OutputPinSelection" or "Pin", the referenced object is a pin (whose parent is the owning object) otherwise its an "normal" flow object. [ObjectProxy, read-only]

member.summary: The objects type name [enum, non empty]

member.summary: The outline size of an object. [double]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.OutlineStyle
member.summary: The outline style of an object. [Enum (int), e.g. Solid, Dot, Dash, DashDot, DashDotDot]

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.Parent
member.summary:
The object reference to the objects parent or null when object has no parent (like the project's root object).
Connections are rooted in the container that also contain the other flow objects. The parent of a Pin object is the flow object it is connected to

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ObjectPropertyNames.PartitionGuid
member.summary: The Guid (as string) of the partition the object resides in (AD > 3.1.3)

member.summary: The type of the pin. [Enum (int) e.g. Invalid, Input, Output]

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ProjectRightLevel
member.summary: right levels of users in projects

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectRightLevel.NoRight
member.summary: the user has no right on this project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectRightLevel.Guest
member.summary: User has guest level access, only read access allowed. A User that has a viewer license assigned always has this right level when assigned to a project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectRightLevel.Worker
member.summary: User has worker access and can modify all normal objects

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectRightLevel.Admin
member.summary: User has project admin access and can: - access project settings. (GUI only) - Has the right to migrate the project to a newer version - Is Allowed to manage project members (GUI only)

member.name: T:Articy.Api.ProjectUnavailabilityReason
member.summary: The reason why a project is currently not available

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectUnavailabilityReason.NoObjections
member.summary: no objections, project is available

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectUnavailabilityReason.AlreadyOpened
member.summary: Project is already opened by the same user, either on the same or different machine

member.name: F:Articy.Api.ProjectUnavailabilityReason.TerminatePending
member.summary: There is a partition termination pending that shortly disables the project for all users

member.summary: A color without alpha channel

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyDataSubType.ColorWithAlpha
member.summary: A color including alpha channel

member.summary: known data types of fields/properties

member.summary: property type is unknown

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyDataType.Text
member.summary: property is of type text

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyDataType.DateTime

member.name: T:Articy.Api.PropertyFilter
member.summary: Flag based filter for of

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyFilter.None
member.summary: get no properties

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyFilter.Base
member.summary: only get properties from the underlying object

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyFilter.Custom
member.summary: only get custom properties that were introduced by features

member.name: F:Articy.Api.PropertyFilter.All
member.summary: get all available properties

member.name: T:Articy.Api.RepartitionMode
member.summary: Specifies how repartitioning should work on the given objects

member.name: F:Articy.Api.RepartitionMode.Create
member.summary: Only create new partitions

member.name: F:Articy.Api.RepartitionMode.Retire
member.summary: Only retire existing partitions

member.name: F:Articy.Api.RepartitionMode.Toggle
member.summary: Retire if alrady a partition, create if not

member.name: T:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn
member.summary: Flag enum for searching for conflicts

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn.References
member.summary: Searches for objects that have broken references

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn.FeatureValues
member.summary: Searches for objects where custom feature values are invalid according to their constraints

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn.TechnicalNames
member.summary: Searches for duplicate technical names within the content objects

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn.Asset
member.summary: Searches for assets that are in a conflicting state

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn.ScriptExpressions
member.summary: Searches for scripts that are in a conflicting state

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchConflictsIn.AnyConflict
member.summary: searches for all of the above issues

member.name: T:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn
member.summary: Flag enum to specify where the simple text search should look up its strings

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.Name
member.summary: Searches in the display name property

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.Description
member.summary: searches in the Text/Description/Spoken Text property

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.FeatureValues
member.summary: searches in custom feature values, numbers are converted to strings before testing

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.Pins
member.summary: searches in the text of connected pins of flow objects

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.OtherTexts
member.summary: searches in other texts like technical names, Note content markup texts, stage directions, preview texts

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.TechnicalName
member.summary: searches in the technical name property

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SearchTextIn.AnyText
member.summary: searches on all of the above places

member.name: T:Articy.Api.SelectionContext
member.summary: Used when reporting a selection to an MDK plugin

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SelectionContext.Other
member.summary: can't be determined

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SelectionContext.Navigator
member.summary: The navigator was used to select an object

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SelectionContext.Location
member.summary: Objects where selected within the location editor

member.summary: Objects were selected in the flow editor

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SelectionContext.ContentBrowser
member.summary: Objects were selected in the content browser

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SelectionContext.Documents
member.summary: Objects were selected in the document editor

member.name: T:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames
member.summary: Technical names of system folders. These names can be used in the FROM clause of a query and to get the folder object when using the method

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Project
member.summary: the root node of the project

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Flow
member.summary: the folder of all flow nodes

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Entities
member.summary: the entities root folder

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Locations

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Documents

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Assets
member.summary: the folder that contains assets

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.Journeys
member.summary: the folder that contains journeys

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.GlobalVariables
member.summary: the folder that contains namespaces and variables

member.name: F:Articy.Api.SystemFolderNames.TemplateDesign
member.summary: the folder that contains template/feature design objects

member.name: T:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation
member.summary: enumeration of filter relations used for

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.HasValue
member.summary: text is present in the field(s) to search

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.IsEmpty
member.summary: no text is present in the field(s) to search

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.Equal
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search equals the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.NotEqual
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search differs the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.Greater
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search is greater than the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.LessOrEqual
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search is less than or equal to the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.Less
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search is less than the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.GreaterOrEqual
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search is greater as or equal to the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.Contains
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search contains the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.DoesNotContain
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search does not contains the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.StartsWith
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search starts with the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.DoesNotStartWith
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search does not start with the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.EndsWith
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search ends with the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.DoesNotEndWith
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search does not end with the given value

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.MatchRegex
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search matches the regular expression given

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFilterRelation.DoesNotMatchRegex
member.summary: the text in the field(s) to search does not match the regular expression given

member.name: T:Articy.Api.TextFormat
member.summary: Enumeration to specify if which format the overload should format the returned text.

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFormat.Plain
member.summary: Get or set the text as plain, unformatted text

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFormat.Html
member.summary: Get or set the text as full HTML text with styles

member.name: F:Articy.Api.TextFormat.BBCode
member.summary: Get or set the text as BBCode enriched text

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.ExportFeatureOrder
member.summary: Determines the sort order of features in the XLSX exports

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportFeatureOrder.Alphabetical
member.summary: Features are sorted ascending by their names (either display- or technical- name), depending on "WhichName" setting. Then they a placed left to right

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportFeatureOrder.UsageCount
member.summary: Features that are used more often (by the objects on that sheet) are shown first.

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.ExportGroupedBy
member.summary: Determines the grouping objects for XLSX exports

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportGroupedBy.Nothing
member.summary: No groups are built

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportGroupedBy.Folder
member.summary: Objects are grouped by their containing folder

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportGroupedBy.ObjectType
member.summary: Objects are grouped by their type

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportGroupedBy.Template
member.summary: Objects are grouped by their template

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.ExportMethod
member.summary: Specifies how the DOCX export genrates its documents

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportMethod.Multiple
member.summary: Multiple documents are created, one for each object

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportMethod.Single
member.summary: All objects are put into one document

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportMethod.List
member.summary: One document is created, the output format is a compact list like form

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy
member.summary: Determines the sort criteria for the objects for DOCX & XLSX exports. For XLSX export the sorting is applied after the objects are grouped. So each group is sorted separately.

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy.DisplayName
member.summary: The objects are sorted by their "DisplayName"

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy.TechnicalName
member.summary: The objects are sorted by their "TechnicalName"

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy.ObjectType
member.summary: The objects are sorted by their object type

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy.Template
member.summary: The objects are sorted by their template name

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy.ProjectPath
member.summary: The objects are sorted based on the path in the navigator tree

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportSortedBy.NavigatorOrder
member.summary: Sort the objects by Navigator order, this is mostly by Displayname but different for locations & documents.

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.ExportVariableOrder
member.summary: Determines which names should be exported in XLSX exports. Is applied to variable names

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportVariableOrder.ScriptingName
member.summary: sort ascending by ScriptingName

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportVariableOrder.Namespace
member.summary: sort ascending by Namespace

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportVariableOrder.DataType
member.summary: sort ascending by DataType

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.ExportWhichName
member.summary: Determines which names should be exported in XLSX exports. Is applied to feature / property names in headlines and to object references in the content data area

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportWhichName.DisplayName
member.summary: Use display names where possible

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.ExportWhichName.TechnicalName
member.summary: use technical names where possible

member.name: T:Articy.Export.Office.PageSize
member.summary: Determines the pagesize in office documents

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.PageSize.A4
member.summary: assume DIN A4 paper size for layouting

member.name: F:Articy.Export.Office.PageSize.Letter
member.summary: assume letter paper size for layouting
